summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from August 1, 2015, to August 31, 2015. It details deposits, debits, and the ending balance, along with instructions for reporting errors in the account statement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is listed as the account holder associated with the Deutsche Bank account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of August 1, 2015, was $10,236.52.
A total of $50,000.00 was deposited into the account during August 2015.
The ending balance as of August 31, 2015, was $53,502.96.
Multiple preauthorized debits were made to the account for tax and payroll fees.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in the account statement.
